title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Description (1 point)

  • Atovaquone prevents/reduces function of the electron transport chain

  • Atovaquone prevents/reduces donation of electrons

  • Atovaquone prevents/reduces synthesis of pyrimidine bases

  • Atovaquone prevents/reduces DNA replication OR transcription
